suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for New /tasks Route
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests to validate the new /tasks route's functionality. Tests should cover route rendering, data loading, error handling, and component interactions. Focus on ensuring the new route behaves identically to the /sessions route under various scenarios.

suggestedTasks.title: Document /tasks Route Implementation and Design Patterns
